entry.title: The Games Industry Is Failing the Working Class

media:group.media:title: The Games Industry Is Failing the Working Class
media:group.media:description:
Why are so few working class people employed by the games industry?
Support us on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/PeopleMakeGames
Created by Sam Greer: https://twitter.com/SamMGreer
Chris Bratt: https://twitter.com/chrisbratt
And Anni Sayers: https://twitter.com/anni_sayers

entry.title: The Video Game Developers Resisting Russia's Invasion

media:group.media:title: The Video Game Developers Resisting Russia's Invasion
media:group.media:description:
We meet some of the Ukrainian game developers living through the invasion of their home, from a refugee who escaped into Western Europe, to a fresh recruit in the Territorial Defence.
Support us on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/PeopleMakeGames
Created by:
Chris Bratt https://twitter.com/chrisbratt
Anni Sayers https://twitter.com/anni_sayers
00:00 - Intro 00:46 - We meet a Ukranian dev forced to flee Ukraine 07:04 - Frogware's CEO on keeping the studio going 11:44 - Two Ukranian developers still in Kyiv 16:39 - A game developer who signed up to fight 19:18 - Raising money for Ukraine
#ukraine #ukrainewar

entry.title: Making Sense of VRChat, the "Metaverse" People Actually Like

media:group.media:title: Making Sense of VRChat, the "Metaverse" People Actually Like
media:group.media:description:
Mark Zuckerberg may have unconvincingly sold you his version of the Metaverse, but let us show you another.
Support us on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/PeopleMakeGames
Written and presented by Quintin Smith: https://twitter.com/Quinns108
Design and art direction by Anni Sayers: https://twitter.com/anni_sayers
00:00 - ThE mEtAvErSe 02:14 - 07:19: We fail to understand VRChat 07:20 - 25:02: We start to understand VRChat 25:03 - End : The scene's troubled future

entry.title: Investigating Three Indie Superstars Accused of Emotional Abuse

media:group.media:title: Investigating Three Indie Superstars Accused of Emotional Abuse
media:group.media:description:
What began as an investigation into the collapse of a single indie studio became something much bigger, as more and more developers came forwards to share their stories.
Support us on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/PeopleMakeGames
Written and presented by Chris Bratt: https://twitter.com/chrisbratt
Design and art direction by Anni Sayers: https://twitter.com/anni_sayers
00:00 - Indie games have a founder problem 04:15 - Ken Wong & Mountains 16:55 - Steve Gaynor & Fullbright 22:52 - Robin Hunicke & Funomena 34:42 - What can we learn from all of this?

entry.title: Roblox Pressured Us to Delete Our Video. So We Dug Deeper.

media:group.media:title: Roblox Pressured Us to Delete Our Video. So We Dug Deeper.
media:group.media:description:
Following our last video on Roblox, players and creators began getting in touch with their own stories to share. Here are some of those stories.
Support us on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/PeopleMakeGames
Original video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_gXlauRB1EQ&
Our response to Ecoscratcher's blog: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=My9U413G3hI
Ecoscratcher's blog: https://medium.com/@ecoscratcher/investigation-how-roblox-isnt-exploiting-developers-and-why-people-make-games-isn-t-trustworthy-7e1c1f0fc493
Written and presented by Quintin Smith: https://twitter.com/Quinns108
Design and art direction by Anni Sayers: https://twitter.com/anni_sayers
00:00 - Intro 3:33 - Roblox's Unregulated Managers 10:01 - Moderation & Child Safety 19:40 - Roblox's Collectible Market 28:41 - Roblox's Black Markets 32:17 - Some Kind Of Conclusion

entry.title: The Inside Story of Mass Effect 3's Endings, Finally Told

media:group.media:title: The Inside Story of Mass Effect 3's Endings, Finally Told
media:group.media:description:
Almost a decade on from the release of Mass Effect 3, we talk to those who worked on it about the gigantic backlash prompted by the game's endings.
Support us on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/PeopleMakeGames
Written and presented by Chris Bratt: https://twitter.com/chrisbratt
Design and art direction by Anni Sayers: https://twitter.com/anni_sayers

entry.title: Investigation: How Roblox Is Exploiting Young Game Developers

media:group.media:title: Investigation: How Roblox Is Exploiting Young Game Developers
media:group.media:description:
With Roblox Corporation now being valued at more than $45 billion, we ask whether the kids making the vast majority of its content are being taken advantage of?
Support us on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/PeopleMakeGames
Written and presented by Quintin Smith: https://twitter.com/Quinns108
Design and art direction by Anni Sayers: https://twitter.com/anni_sayers

entry.title: The Game Prototype That Had to Be Banned by Its Own Studio

media:group.media:title: The Game Prototype That Had to Be Banned by Its Own Studio
media:group.media:description:
After the huge success of games like Fruit Ninja and Jetpack Joyride, Halfbrick Studios began prototyping some new ideas for their next game. This is the story behind one of those prototypes; a game that caused so many problems within the studio, its creators were forced to ban it from being played entirely.
Support us on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/PeopleMakeGames
Luke's GDC talk on the prototype: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=t9WMNuyjm4w&
Written and presented by Chris Bratt: https://twitter.com/chrisbratt
Design and art direction by Anni Sayers: https://twitter.com/anni_sayers

entry.title: Ubisoft's Blockchain Experiments Are Bad for the Planet

media:group.media:title: Ubisoft's Blockchain Experiments Are Bad for the Planet
media:group.media:description:
For the last four years, Ubisoft has been experimenting with blockchain projects, hoping to find a new revenue stream for the $1.5 billion games company. But does it have a stance on how this stuff directly affects the climate crisis?
Support us on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/PeopleMakeGames
Written and presented by Chris Bratt: https://twitter.com/chrisbratt
Design and art direction by Anni Sayers: https://twitter.com/anni_sayers

entry.title: How Game Publishers Buy Crunch Overseas

media:group.media:title: How Game Publishers Buy Crunch Overseas
media:group.media:description:
We spoke to game developers from Malaysia and Indonesia to better understand how AAA game publishers profit from other people doing their crunch overseas.
Support us on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/PeopleMakeGames
Written and presented by Chris Bratt: https://twitter.com/chrisbratt
Design and art direction by Anni Sayers: https://twitter.com/anni_sayers

entry.title: Behind-the-scenes at a World Class Escape Room

media:group.media:title: Behind-the-scenes at a World Class Escape Room
media:group.media:description:
Join us as we sneak behind-the-scenes at an award-winning Escape Room and find out what goes into designing the perfect puzzle box.
Support us on Patreon (and access the full 70-minute playthrough): https://www.patreon.com/PeopleMakeGames
Thanks so much to Brighton-based Pier Pressure for letting us pick apart their Loot the Lanes room. They've got a bunch more: https://pierpressure.co.uk/
